260.b: Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique

500.a: Nine articles concerning internationalization of science are compiled in this volume. A methodology has been developed by use of a 98 country-matrix. Two principal indicators have been developped : the affinity INdex (AFI) and the balance between the fields (BAL).

505.a: Structure of international collaboration in science : typology of countries through multivariate techniques using a link indicator -- International co-operation in basic science -- Evaluation of international collaboration -- Science production and international co-operation between G7 countries and their twelve first partners -- The scientific co-operation between Canada and the European Community -- International scientific collaboration of Japan, co-authorship analysis -- The changing patterns of international collaboration in universities -- International scientific collaboration in Arab Countries -- An overview of bibliometric methods.
